en.Bako Group가 화학 물질의 안전한 사용을 위한 유럽 규정을 준수하: Confirms that Bako Group adheres to European regulations for the safe use of chemicals.
en.Occupational Health & Safety Management: Occupational Health & Safety Management System ISO 45001
en.Awarded to Bako Group for our commitment: Awarded to Bako Group for our commitment to environmental protection and sustainability.
en.Recognizes Bako Group's dedication to ma: Recognizes Bako Group's dedication to maintaining the highest quality management standards.
en.Acknowledges Bako Group's prioritization: Acknowledges Bako Group's prioritization of employee safety and health in our operations.
en.Confirms that Bako Group adheres to Euro: Confirms that Bako Group adheres to European regulations for the safe use of chemicals.
en.facilities_description: BAKO Group operates with advanced manufacturing and laboratory facilities designed to maintain the highest standards of quality, safety, and innovation in every product we deliver.
en.factory_description: State-of-the-art production facility ensuring consistent quality.
en.production_description: Modern equipment and technology powering reliable output.
en.lab_description: Comprehensive testing ensures excellence in every lubricant.
en.rd_description: Innovating new formulations for future lubrication needs.
en.At BAKO Group, our mission is to drive i: At BAKO Group, our mission is to drive innovation and sustainability in lubrication technology. We believe that every drop of oil we produce carries our commitment to quality, reliability, and global progress.
en.“Our journey is not just about performan: “Our journey is not just about performance — it’s about partnership, trust, and building a better future together.”
en.Premium quality oils for all types of ve: Premium quality oils for all types of vehicles, ensuring optimal performance and engine protection. Our automotive lubricants are designed to meet the highest standards, providing superior engine protection, improved fuel efficiency, and extended vehicle lifespan.
en.Specialized lubricants for industrial ma: Specialized lubricants for industrial machinery, reducing friction and extending equipment life. Engineered for heavy-duty industrial applications, our lubricants minimize wear, reduce downtime, and enhance operational efficiency in manufacturing and construction environments.
en.Bako, the lubricant brand of world-class: Bako, the lubricant brand of world-class petrochemical company GS Caltex, is trusted by customers worldwide.
en.*Recognized as Korea's No. 1 brand in th: *Recognized as Korea's No. 1 brand in the lubricant category as winner of Korea's First Brand Awards for nine consecutive years
en.Bako is a trusted and certified company: Bako is a trusted and certified company specializing in high-quality mineral oils and lubricants. We are committed to providing reliable, premium products for automotive and industrial applications.
en.Our oils are manufactured to the highest: Our oils are manufactured to the highest international standards, ensuring performance, protection, and longevity for your machinery and vehicles.
en.With years of experience and a reputatio: With years of experience and a reputation for excellence, Bako stands as a symbol of quality and trust in the lubricants industry. Our mission is to deliver innovative solutions and outstanding customer service to our partners and clients worldwide.
en.premium_lubricants_text: Premium lubricants and mineral oils for automotive and industrial applications.
en.We are proud to present the highest stan: We are proud to present the highest standards of quality and excellence.
en.Awarded for our commitment to applying t: Awarded for our commitment to applying the highest quality management standards in all our operations, ensuring customer satisfaction and delivering products and services that exceed expectations.
en.Recognizing our team's efforts in provid: Recognizing our team's efforts in providing an exceptional customer service experience and building strong, sustainable client relationships. We believe that excellent service is the foundation of success.
en.This certificate is awarded for our pion: This certificate is awarded for our pioneering role in developing innovative solutions that advance the industry. We always strive to adopt the latest technologies to provide added value to our partners.
en.High performance lubricant for modern au: High performance lubricant for modern automotive engines.
en.Synthetic lubricant for extended engine: Synthetic lubricant for extended engine life.
en.Heavy-duty oil for trucks and commercial: Heavy-duty oil for trucks and commercial vehicles.
en.Premium oil for industrial machinery and: Premium oil for industrial machinery and equipment.
en.Your message will be sent directly to ou: Your message will be sent directly to our inbox.
en.How We Make Our Car Oils: How We Make Our Car Oils
en.Our car oils are produced using advanced: Our car oils are produced using advanced refining processes, blending high-quality base oils with state-of-the-art additives to ensure maximum engine protection, performance, and longevity.
en.Strict quality control at every stage: Strict quality control at every stage
en.Founded in 1995, Bako Oil Company began: Founded in 1995, Bako Oil Company began as a small family-owned business with a vision to provide high-quality lubricants to the automotive industry. Over the years, we have grown into a leading manufacturer of mineral oils and lubricants, serving customers worldwide.
en.Our commitment to innovation, sustainabi: Our commitment to innovation, sustainability, and customer satisfaction has driven us to expand our operations and invest in state-of-the-art facilities. Today, Bako stands as a symbol of reliability and excellence in the lubricants market.
en.Meets and exceeds international standard: Meets and exceeds international standards (API, ACEA, etc.)
en.High viscosity index for optimal perform: High viscosity index for optimal performance in all temperatures
en.Excellent detergency and dispersancy for: Excellent detergency and dispersancy for cleaner engines
en.Low volatility for reduced oil consumpti: Low volatility for reduced oil consumption
en.Name: Name
en.Specialized fluid for automatic transmis: Specialized fluid for automatic transmissions, ensuring smooth gear shifts and optimal performance. Formulated to deliver exceptional performance in automatic transmissions, our Dexron 3 fluid ensures smooth shifting, prevents overheating, and prolongs transmission life.
en.Our automotive lubricants are engineered: Our automotive lubricants are engineered for durability and efficiency — designed to reduce friction, enhance engine performance, and extend vehicle life. Whether for everyday drivers or high-performance engines, BAKO’s advanced formulas deliver unmatched reliability.
en.Advanced protection against wear, suitab: Advanced protection against wear, suitable for all modern engines.
en.Perfect balance of performance and value: Perfect balance of performance and value for passenger vehicles.
en.Formulated to protect older engines, red: Formulated to protect older engines, reducing leaks and extending life.
en.Ready to Enhance Your Engine’s Performan: Ready to Enhance Your Engine’s Performance?
en.Contact us today to learn more about our: Contact us today to learn more about our automotive lubricant solutions.
en.Our industrial lubricants are formulated: Our industrial lubricants are formulated to reduce friction, enhance machine efficiency, and extend equipment life. From heavy-duty manufacturing to energy production, BAKO’s solutions ensure smooth operation under the most demanding industrial conditions.
en.Designed for precision machinery, ensuri: Designed for precision machinery, ensuring smooth hydraulic system performance and wear protection.
en.High-performance lubricant that extends: High-performance lubricant that extends compressor life while improving energy efficiency.
en.Formulated for heavy-duty gear systems t: Formulated for heavy-duty gear systems to minimize friction and extend component life.
en.Keep Your Industry Moving with Confidenc: Keep Your Industry Moving with Confidence
en.Contact us to discover how BAKO’s indust: Contact us to discover how BAKO’s industrial lubricants can improve your operational efficiency.
en.Thank you for choosing BAKO as your trus: Thank you for choosing BAKO as your trusted partner in lubrication solutions. We look forward to a successful journey together.
en.Our team is dedicated to understanding y: Our team is dedicated to understanding your unique needs and delivering tailored solutions that drive performance and efficiency. We are committed to innovation, sustainability, and excellence in everything we do.
en.At BAKO, we believe in more than just pr: At BAKO, we believe in more than just providing high-quality lubricants; we believe in building lasting relationships with our customers based on trust, reliability, and mutual success.

ko.Occupational Health & Safety Management: 산업 안전 보건 경영 시스템 ISO 45001
ko.Awarded to Bako Group for our commitment: Bako Group의 환경 보호 및 지속 가능성에 대한 헌신을 인정받아 수여된 인증입니다.
ko.Recognizes Bako Group's dedication to ma: Bako Group이 최고 품질 관리 기준을 유지하기 위한 헌신을 인정받았습니다.
ko.Acknowledges Bako Group's prioritization: Bako Group이 직원의 안전과 건강을 최우선으로 하는 운영 방식을 인정받았습니다.
ko.Confirms that Bako Group adheres to Euro: Bako Group이 화학 물질의 안전한 사용을 위한 유럽 규정을 준수하고 있음을 확인합니다.
ko.facilities_description: BAKO 그룹은 최고 수준의 품질, 안전 및 혁신 기준을 유지하기 위해 첨단 제조 및 연구 시설을 운영하고 있습니다.
ko.factory_description: 일관된 품질을 보장하는 최첨단 생산 시설입니다.
ko.production_description: 신뢰할 수 있는 생산을 위한 현대적인 장비와 기술을 갖추고 있습니다.
ko.lab_description: 모든 윤활유의 우수성을 보장하기 위한 종합적인 테스트를 수행합니다.
ko.rd_description: 미래 윤활 요구를 위한 새로운 제형을 혁신합니다.
ko.At BAKO Group, our mission is to drive i: BAKO 그룹에서 우리의 사명은 윤활 기술의 혁신과 지속 가능성을 추진하는 것입니다. 우리가 생산하는 모든 오일 한 방울에는 품질, 신뢰성 및 글로벌 발전에 대한 우리의 약속이 담겨 있다고 믿습니다.
ko.“Our journey is not just about performan: “우리의 여정은 단순한 성능에 관한 것이 아닙니다 — 그것은 파트너십, 신뢰, 그리고 함께 더 나은 미래를 구축하는 것에 관한 것입니다.”
ko.Specialized fluid for automatic transmis: 자동 변속기를 위한 특화 유체로, 부드러운 기어 변속과 최적의 성능을 보장합니다. 자동 변속기에서 탁월한 성능을 제공하도록 제조된 우리의 Dexron 3 유체는 부드러운 변속을 보장하고 과열을 방지하며 변속기 수명을 연장합니다.
ko.Premium quality oils for all types of ve: 모든 차량에 적합한 프리미엄 오일로 최적의 성능과 엔진 보호를 보장합니다. 우리의 자동차 윤활유는 최고 표준을 충족하도록 설계되어 우수한 엔진 보호, 향상된 연료 효율성 및 연장된 차량 수명을 제공합니다.
ko.Specialized lubricants for industrial ma: 산업 기계 전용 윤활유로 마찰을 줄이고 장비 수명을 연장합니다. 중부하 산업용으로 설계된 우리의 윤활유는 마모를 최소화하고 다운타임을 줄이며 제조 및 건설 환경에서 운영 효율성을 향상시킵니다.
ko.Bako, the lubricant brand of world-class: 세계적 석유화학 기업 GS칼텍스의 윤활유 브랜드 바코는 전 세계 고객에게 신뢰받고 있습니다.
ko.*Recognized as Korea's No. 1 brand in th: *한국 퍼스트브랜드 대상 9년 연속 수상, 윤활유 부문 대한민국 1위 브랜드로 선정
ko.Bako is a trusted and certified company: 바코는 고품질 미네랄 오일과 윤활유를 전문으로 하는 신뢰받는 인증 기업입니다. 자동차 및 산업용 프리미엄 제품을 제공합니다.
ko.Our oils are manufactured to the highest: 저희 오일은 최고 국제 기준에 따라 제조되어 성능, 보호, 내구성을 보장합니다.
ko.With years of experience and a reputatio: 오랜 경험과 우수한 명성으로 바코는 윤활유 업계의 품질과 신뢰의 상징입니다. 혁신적인 솔루션과 최고의 고객 서비스를 전 세계 파트너와 고객에게 제공합니다.
ko.premium_lubricants_text: 자동차 및 산업용 프리미엄 윤활유 및 광유.
ko.We are proud to present the highest stan: 우리는 최고의 품질과 우수성의 기준을 제시하게 된 것을 자랑스럽게 생각합니다.
ko.Awarded for our commitment to applying t: 모든 운영에서 최고 품질 관리 표준을 적용하려는 우리의 노력에 대해 수여되었으며, 고객 만족을 보장하고 기대를 뛰어넘는 제품과 서비스를 제공합니다.
ko.Recognizing our team's efforts in provid: 탁월한 고객 서비스 경험을 제공하고 강력하고 지속 가능한 고객 관계를 구축하는 데있어 우리 팀의 노력을 인정합니다. 우리는 우수한 서비스가 성공의 기초라고 믿습니다.
ko.This certificate is awarded for our pion: 이 인증서는 업계를 발전시키는 혁신적인 솔루션을 개발하는 데있어 우리의 선구적인 역할에 대해 수여됩니다. 우리는 항상 파트너에게 부가 가치를 제공하기 위해 최신 기술을 채택하기 위해 노력합니다.
ko.High performance lubricant for modern au: 현대 자동차 엔진을 위한 고성능 윤활유.
ko.Heavy-duty oil for trucks and commercial: 트럭 및 상용차를 위한 헤비 듀티 오일.
ko.Premium oil for industrial machinery and: 산업 기계 및 장비를 위한 프리미엄 오일.
ko.Your message will be sent directly to ou: 귀하의 메시지는 우리 받은 편지함으로 직접 전송됩니다.
ko.Best Automotive Kinetics Oil & Lubricant: 최고의 자동차 운동 에너지 오일 및 윤활유
ko.Our car oils are produced using advanced: 우리의 자동차 오일은 최고 수준의 엔진 보호, 성능 및 내구성을 보장하기 위해 고품질 기유와 최첨단 첨가제를 혼합하는 고급 정제 공정을 사용하여 생산됩니다.
ko.Founded in 1995, Bako Oil Company began: 1995년에 설립된 Bako Oil Company는 자동차 산업에 고품질 윤활유를 제공하는 비전을 가지고 작은 가족 소유 사업으로 시작했습니다. 수년 동안 우리는 전 세계 고객에게 서비스를 제공하는 미네랄 오일과 윤활유의 선도적인 제조업체로 성장했습니다.
ko.Our commitment to innovation, sustainabi: 혁신, 지속 가능성 및 고객 만족에 대한 우리의 약속은 운영을 확장하고 최첨단 시설에 투자하도록 이끌었습니다. 오늘날 Bako는 윤활유 시장에서 신뢰성과 우수성의 상징으로 서 있습니다.
ko.Meets and exceeds international standard: 국제 표준(API, ACEA 등)을 충족하고 초과합니다.
ko.High viscosity index for optimal perform: 모든 온도에서 최적의 성능을 위한 높은 점도 지수
ko.Excellent detergency and dispersancy for: 깨끗한 엔진을 위한 우수한 세정력과 분산력
ko.Low volatility for reduced oil consumpti: 오일 소비 감소를 위한 낮은 휘발성
ko.Name: 이름
ko.Our automotive lubricants are engineered: 당사의 자동차 윤활유는 내구성과 효율성을 위해 설계되었습니다. 마찰을 줄이고 엔진 성능을 향상시키며 차량 수명을 연장하도록 설계되었습니다. 일상적인 운전자든 고성능 엔진이든 BAKO의 고급 포뮬러는 탁월한 신뢰성을 제공합니다.
ko.Advanced protection against wear, suitab: 모든 현대 엔진에 적합한 고급 마모 방지.
ko.Perfect balance of performance and value: 승용차를 위한 성능과 가치의 완벽한 균형.
ko.Formulated to protect older engines, red: 오래된 엔진을 보호하고 누출을 줄이며 수명을 연장하도록 제조되었습니다.
ko.Contact us today to learn more about our: 오늘 저희에게 연락하여 자동차 윤활유 솔루션에 대해 자세히 알아보십시오.
ko.Our industrial lubricants are formulated: 당사의 산업용 윤활유는 마찰을 줄이고 기계 효율성을 높이며 장비 수명을 연장하도록 제조되었습니다. 중장비 제조에서 에너지 생산에 이르기까지 BAKO의 솔루션은 가장 까다로운 산업 조건에서도 원활한 작동을 보장합니다.
ko.Designed for precision machinery, ensuri: 정밀 기계용으로 설계되어 원활한 유압 시스템 성능과 마모 방지를 보장합니다.
ko.High-performance lubricant that extends: 압축기 수명을 연장하고 에너지 효율을 향상시키는 고성능 윤활유.
ko.Formulated for heavy-duty gear systems t: 마찰을 최소화하고 부품 수명을 연장하기 위해 중장비 기어 시스템용으로 제조되었습니다.
ko.Contact us to discover how BAKO’s indust: BAKO의 산업용 윤활유가 운영 효율성을 어떻게 향상시킬 수 있는지 알아보려면 저희에게 문의하십시오.
ko.Thank you for choosing BAKO as your trus: 윤활 솔루션의 신뢰할 수 있는 파트너로 BAKO를 선택해 주셔서 감사합니다. 함께 성공적인 여정을 기대합니다.
ko.Our team is dedicated to understanding y: 우리 팀은 귀하의 고유한 요구 사항을 이해하고 성능과 효율성을 높이는 맞춤형 솔루션을 제공하는 데 전념하고 있습니다. 우리는 우리가 하는 모든 일에서 혁신, 지속 가능성 및 우수성을 약속합니다.
ko.At BAKO, we believe in more than just pr: BAKO에서는 고품질 윤활유를 제공하는 것 이상을 믿습니다. 우리는 신뢰, 신뢰성 및 상호 성공을 기반으로 고객과 지속적인 관계를 구축하는 것을 믿습니다.

tr.Bako Group가 화학 물질의 안전한 사용을 위한 유럽 규정을 준수하: Bako Group’un kimyasalların güvenli kullanımıyla ilgili Avrupa düzenlemelerine uyduğunu onaylar.
tr.Occupational Health & Safety Management: İş Sağlığı ve Güvenliği Yönetim Sistemi ISO 45001
tr.Awarded to Bako Group for our commitment: Bako Group’un çevre koruma ve sürdürülebilirliğe olan bağlılığını takdir eden sertifika.
tr.Recognizes Bako Group's dedication to ma: Bako Group’un en yüksek kalite yönetim standartlarını sürdürme konusundaki özverisini tanır.
tr.Acknowledges Bako Group's prioritization: Bako Group’un operasyonlarında çalışan güvenliği ve sağlığına öncelik verdiğini kabul eder.
tr.Confirms that Bako Group adheres to Euro: Bako Group’un kimyasalların güvenli kullanımıyla ilgili Avrupa düzenlemelerine uyduğunu onaylar.
tr.facilities_description: BAKO Group, en yüksek kalite, güvenlik ve yenilik standartlarını korumak için gelişmiş üretim ve laboratuvar tesisleriyle faaliyet göstermektedir.
tr.factory_description: Tutarlı kalite sağlayan son teknoloji üretim tesisi.
tr.production_description: Güvenilir üretim için modern ekipman ve teknoloji kullanıyoruz.
tr.lab_description: Her yağlayıcıda mükemmelliği sağlamak için kapsamlı testler yapılır.
tr.rd_description: Geleceğin yağlama ihtiyaçları için yeni formülasyonlar geliştiriyoruz.
tr.At BAKO Group, our mission is to drive i: BAKO Grubu olarak misyonumuz, yağlama teknolojisinde yenilik ve sürdürülebilirliği sağlamaktır. Ürettiğimiz her damla yağın kalite, güvenilirlik ve küresel ilerleme taahhüdümüzü taşıdığına inanıyoruz.
tr.“Our journey is not just about performan: “Yolculuğumuz sadece performansla ilgili değil — ortaklık, güven ve birlikte daha iyi bir gelecek inşa etmekle ilgilidir.”
tr.Premium quality oils for all types of ve: Tüm araç türleri için optimum performans ve motor koruması sağlayan premium kalite yağlar. Otomotiv yağlarımız en yüksek standartları karşılamak üzere tasarlanmıştır, üstün motor koruması, geliştirilmiş yakıt verimliliği ve uzatılmış araç ömrü sağlar.
tr.Specialized lubricants for industrial ma: Endüstriyel makineler için sürtünmeyi azaltan ve ekipman ömrünü uzatan özel yağlar. Ağır hizmet tipi endüstriyel uygulamalar için tasarlanmış yağlarımız aşınmayı en aza indirir, duruş sürelerini azaltır ve üretim ve inşaat ortamlarında operasyonel verimliliği artırır.
tr.Bako, the lubricant brand of world-class: Dünya çapındaki petrokimya şirketi GS Caltex'in yağ markası Bako, dünya çapındaki müşteriler tarafından güvenilir.
tr.*Recognized as Korea's No. 1 brand in th: *Kore'nin İlk Marka Ödülleri'nde dokuz yıl üst üste kazanarak yağ kategorisinde Kore'nin No. 1 markası olarak tanınır
tr.Bako is a trusted and certified company: Bako, yüksek kaliteli mineral yağlar ve yağlarda uzmanlaşmış güvenilir ve sertifikalı bir şirkettir. Otomotiv ve endüstriyel uygulamalar için güvenilir, premium ürünler sağlamaya kararlıyız.
tr.Our oils are manufactured to the highest: Yağlarımız en yüksek uluslararası standartlara göre üretilir, makineleriniz ve araçlarınız için performans, koruma ve uzun ömür sağlar.
tr.With years of experience and a reputatio: Yılların deneyimi ve mükemmellik itibarıyla Bako, yağ endüstrisinde kalite ve güvenin sembolü olarak durur. Misyonumuz, dünya çapındaki ortaklarımıza ve müşterilerimize yenilikçi çözümler ve üstün müşteri hizmeti sunmaktır.
tr.premium_lubricants_text: Otomotiv ve endüstriyel uygulamalar için premium yağlar ve mineral yağlar.
tr.We are proud to present the highest stan: En yüksek kalite ve mükemmellik standartlarını sunmaktan gurur duyuyoruz.
tr.Awarded for our commitment to applying t: Tüm operasyonlarımızda en yüksek kalite yönetim standartlarını uygulama taahhüdümüz için ödüllendirildik, müşteri memnuniyetini sağlayarak beklentileri aşan ürünler ve hizmetler sunuyoruz.
tr.Recognizing our team's efforts in provid: Takımımızın olağanüstü müşteri hizmet deneyimi sağlama ve güçlü, sürdürülebilir müşteri ilişkileri kurma çabalarını takdir ediyoruz. Mükemmel hizmetin başarının temeli olduğuna inanıyoruz.
tr.This certificate is awarded for our pion: Bu sertifika, endüstriyi ilerleten yenilikçi çözümler geliştirmedeki öncü rolümüz için verilir. Ortaklarımıza katma değer sağlamak için her zaman en son teknolojileri benimsemeye çalışırız.
tr.High performance lubricant for modern au: Modern otomotiv motorları için yüksek performanslı yağ.
tr.Synthetic lubricant for extended engine: Uzatılmış motor ömrü için sentetik yağ.
tr.Advanced protection for high-performance: Yüksek performanslı motorlar için gelişmiş koruma.
tr.Heavy-duty oil for trucks and commercial: Kamyonlar ve ticari araçlar için ağır hizmet tipi yağ.
tr.Multi-purpose oil for various applicatio: Çeşitli uygulamalar için çok amaçlı yağ.
tr.Eco-friendly lubricant for modern engine: Modern motorlar için çevre dostu yağ.
tr.Premium oil for industrial machinery and: Endüstriyel makineler ve ekipman için premium yağ.
tr.Best Automotive Kinetics Oil & Lubricant: En İyi Otomotiv Kinetik Yağı ve Yağları
tr.Our car oils are produced using advanced: Araba yağlarımız, maksimum motor koruması, performans ve uzun ömür sağlamak için yüksek kaliteli baz yağları ile en modern katkı maddelerini karıştıran gelişmiş rafinasyon süreçleri kullanılarak üretilir.
tr.Founded in 1995, Bako Oil Company began: 1995'te kurulan Bako Oil Company, otomotiv endüstrisine yüksek kaliteli yağlar sağlama vizyonuyla küçük bir aile şirketi olarak başladı. Yıllar içinde, dünya çapında müşterilere hizmet veren mineral yağlar ve yağların önde gelen üreticisi haline geldik.
tr.Our commitment to innovation, sustainabi: İnovasyon, sürdürülebilirlik ve müşteri memnuniyetine olan bağlılığımız, operasyonlarımızı genişletmemizi ve en modern tesislere yatırım yapmamızı sağladı. Bugün Bako, yağ pazarında güvenilirlik ve mükemmelliğin sembolü olarak duruyor.
tr.Meets and exceeds international standard: Uluslararası standartları karşılar ve aşar (API, ACEA vb.)
tr.High viscosity index for optimal perform: Tüm sıcaklıklarda optimum performans için yüksek viskozite indeksi
tr.Excellent detergency and dispersancy for: Daha temiz motorlar için mükemmel deterjans ve dispersanlık
tr.Low volatility for reduced oil consumpti: Azaltılmış yağ tüketimi için düşük uçuculuk
tr.Name: İsim
tr.Specialized fluid for automatic transmis: Otomatik şanzımanlar için özel sıvı, pürüzsüz vites değişimleri ve optimum performans sağlar. Otomatik şanzımanlarda olağanüstü performans sunmak üzere formüle edilmiş Dexron 3 sıvımız, pürüzsüz değişimi sağlar, aşırı ısınmayı önler ve şanzıman ömrünü uzatır.
tr.Our automotive lubricants are engineered: Otomotiv yağlarımız dayanıklılık ve verimlilik için tasarlanmıştır — sürtünmeyi azaltmak, motor performansını artırmak ve araç ömrünü uzatmak için tasarlanmıştır. Günlük sürücüler veya yüksek performanslı motorlar için olsun, BAKO'nun gelişmiş formülleri eşsiz güvenilirlik sunar.
tr.Advanced protection against wear, suitab: Tüm modern motorlar için uygun, aşınmaya karşı gelişmiş koruma.
tr.Perfect balance of performance and value: Binek araçlar için performans ve değerin mükemmel dengesi.
tr.Formulated to protect older engines, red: Eski motorları korumak, sızıntıları azaltmak ve ömrünü uzatmak için formüle edilmiştir.
tr.Contact us today to learn more about our: Otomotiv yağ çözümlerimiz hakkında daha fazla bilgi edinmek için bugün bize ulaşın.
tr.Our industrial lubricants are formulated: Endüstriyel yağlarımız sürtünmeyi azaltmak, makine verimliliğini artırmak ve ekipman ömrünü uzatmak için formüle edilmiştir. Ağır hizmet tipi üretimden enerji üretimine kadar, BAKO'nun çözümleri en zorlu endüstriyel koşullarda bile sorunsuz çalışmayı sağlar.
tr.Designed for precision machinery, ensuri: Hassas makineler için tasarlanmış, sorunsuz hidrolik sistem performansı ve aşınma koruması sağlar.
tr.High-performance lubricant that extends: Kompresör ömrünü uzatan ve enerji verimliliğini artıran yüksek performanslı yağ.
tr.Formulated for heavy-duty gear systems t: Ağır hizmet tipi dişli sistemleri için sürtünmeyi en aza indirmek ve bileşen ömrünü uzatmak için formüle edilmiştir.
tr.Contact us to discover how BAKO’s indust: BAKO'nun endüstriyel yağlarının operasyonel verimliliğinizi nasıl artırabileceğini keşfetmek için bize ulaşın.
tr.Thank you for choosing BAKO as your trus: Yağlama çözümlerinde güvenilir ortağınız olarak BAKO'yu seçtiğiniz için teşekkür ederiz. Birlikte başarılı bir yolculuk yapmayı dört gözle bekliyoruz.
tr.Our team is dedicated to understanding y: Ekibimiz, benzersiz ihtiyaçlarınızı anlamaya ve performans ve verimliliği artıran özel çözümler sunmaya kendini adamıştır. Yaptığımız her şeyde inovasyon, sürdürülebilirlik ve mükemmelliğe bağlıyız.
tr.At BAKO, we believe in more than just pr: BAKO'da, sadece yüksek kaliteli yağlar sağlamakla kalmayıp; güven, güvenilirlik ve karşılıklı başarıya dayalı olarak müşterilerimizle kalıcı ilişkiler kurmaya inanıyoruz.

fr.Bako Group가 화학 물질의 안전한 사용을 위한 유럽 규정을 준수하: Confirme que le groupe Bako respecte les réglementations européennes sur l'utilisation sûre des produits chimiques.
fr.Environmental Management System ISO 9001: Système de gestion de la qualité ISO 9001
fr.Occupational Health & Safety Management: Système de gestion de la santé et de la sécurité au travail ISO 45001
fr.Awarded to Bako Group for our commitment: Décerné au groupe Bako pour son engagement envers la protection de l'environnement et la durabilité.
fr.Recognizes Bako Group's dedication to ma: Reconnaît l'engagement du groupe Bako à maintenir les normes de gestion de la qualité les plus élevées.
fr.Acknowledges Bako Group's prioritization: Reconnaît la priorité du groupe Bako à la sécurité et à la santé de ses employés.
fr.Confirms that Bako Group adheres to Euro: Confirme que le groupe Bako respecte les réglementations européennes sur l'utilisation sûre des produits chimiques.
fr.facilities_description: Le groupe BAKO dispose d’installations de fabrication et de laboratoire avancées, conçues pour maintenir les plus hauts standards de qualité, de sécurité et d’innovation dans chaque produit que nous livrons.
fr.factory_description: Installation de production ultramoderne garantissant une qualité constante.
fr.production_description: Équipements et technologies modernes assurant une production fiable.
fr.lab_description: Des tests complets garantissent l’excellence de chaque lubrifiant.
fr.rd_description: Nous développons de nouvelles formulations pour les besoins futurs en lubrification.
fr.“Our journey is not just about performan: « Notre voyage ne concerne pas seulement la performance — il s'agit de partenariat, de confiance et de construire un avenir meilleur ensemble. »
fr.Premium quality oils for all types of ve: Huiles de qualité premium pour tous types de véhicules, assurant des performances optimales et une protection du moteur. Nos lubrifiants automobiles sont conçus pour répondre aux normes les plus élevées, offrant une protection supérieure du moteur, une meilleure efficacité énergétique et une durée de vie prolongée du véhicule.
fr.Specialized lubricants for industrial ma: Lubrifiants spécialisés pour machines industrielles, réduisant les frottements et prolongeant la durée de vie des équipements. Conçus pour des applications industrielles lourdes, nos lubrifiants minimisent l'usure, réduisent les temps d'arrêt et améliorent l'efficacité opérationnelle dans les environnements de fabrication et de construction.
fr.Bako, the lubricant brand of world-class: Bako, la marque de lubrifiants de la société pétrochimique de classe mondiale GS Caltex, est appréciée des clients du monde entier.
fr.*Recognized as Korea's No. 1 brand in th: *Reconnue comme la marque No. 1 de Corée dans la catégorie des lubrifiants en tant que gagnante des Korea's First Brand Awards pendant neuf années consécutives
fr.Bako is a trusted and certified company: Bako est une entreprise de confiance et certifiée spécialisée dans les huiles minérales et lubrifiants de haute qualité. Nous nous engageons à fournir des produits fiables et premium pour les applications automobiles et industrielles.
fr.Our oils are manufactured to the highest: Nos huiles sont fabriquées selon les normes internationales les plus élevées, assurant performance, protection et longévité pour vos machines et véhicules.
fr.With years of experience and a reputatio: Avec des années d'expérience et une réputation d'excellence, Bako est un symbole de qualité et de confiance dans l'industrie des lubrifiants. Notre mission est de fournir des solutions innovantes et un service client exceptionnel à nos partenaires et clients du monde entier.
fr.premium_lubricants_text: Lubrifiants et huiles minérales premium pour applications automobiles et industrielles.
fr.We are proud to present the highest stan: Nous sommes fiers de présenter les normes les plus élevées de qualité et d'excellence.
fr.Awarded for our commitment to applying t: Récompensé pour notre engagement à appliquer les normes de gestion de qualité les plus élevées dans toutes nos opérations, assurant la satisfaction client et livrant des produits et services qui dépassent les attentes.
fr.Recognizing our team's efforts in provid: Reconnaissant les efforts de notre équipe pour fournir une expérience de service client exceptionnelle et construire des relations clients solides et durables. Nous croyons que le service excellent est la base du succès.
fr.This certificate is awarded for our pion: Ce certificat est décerné pour notre rôle pionnier dans le développement de solutions innovantes qui font avancer l'industrie. Nous nous efforçons toujours d'adopter les dernières technologies pour apporter une valeur ajoutée à nos partenaires.
fr.High performance lubricant for modern au: Lubrifiant haute performance pour moteurs automobiles modernes.
fr.Synthetic lubricant for extended engine: Lubrifiant synthétique pour une durée de vie prolongée du moteur.
fr.Advanced protection for high-performance: Protection avancée pour moteurs haute performance.
fr.Heavy-duty oil for trucks and commercial: Huile lourde pour camions et véhicules commerciaux.
fr.Premium oil for industrial machinery and: Huile premium pour machines et équipements industriels.
fr.Your message will be sent directly to ou: Votre message sera envoyé directement dans notre boîte de réception.
fr.Best Automotive Kinetics Oil & Lubricant: Meilleure Huile et Lubrifiants Cinétiques Automobiles
fr.How We Make Our Car Oils: Comment Nous Fabriquons Nos Huiles de Voiture
fr.Our car oils are produced using advanced: Nos huiles de voiture sont produites en utilisant des processus de raffinage avancés, mélangeant des huiles de base de haute qualité avec des additifs de pointe pour assurer une protection maximale du moteur, des performances et une longévité.
fr.Strict quality control at every stage: Contrôle qualité strict à chaque étape
fr.Environmentally responsible manufacturin: Fabrication responsable sur le plan environnemental
fr.Founded in 1995, Bako Oil Company began: Fondée en 1995, Bako Oil Company a commencé comme une petite entreprise familiale avec pour vision de fournir des lubrifiants de haute qualité à l'industrie automobile. Au fil des ans, nous sommes devenus un fabricant leader d'huiles minérales et de lubrifiants, servant des clients du monde entier.
fr.Our commitment to innovation, sustainabi: Notre engagement envers l'innovation, la durabilité et la satisfaction client nous a poussés à étendre nos opérations et à investir dans des installations de pointe. Aujourd'hui, Bako est un symbole de fiabilité et d'excellence sur le marché des lubrifiants.
fr.Meets and exceeds international standard: Respecte et dépasse les normes internationales (API, ACEA, etc.)
fr.High viscosity index for optimal perform: Indice de viscosité élevé pour des performances optimales à toutes les températures
fr.Excellent detergency and dispersancy for: Excellente détergence et dispersivité pour des moteurs plus propres
fr.Superior oxidation and thermal stability: Stabilité supérieure à l'oxydation et thermique
fr.Low volatility for reduced oil consumpti: Faible volatilité pour une consommation d'huile réduite
fr.Name: Nom
fr.Specialized fluid for automatic transmis: Fluide spécialisé pour transmissions automatiques, assurant des changements de vitesse fluides et des performances optimales. Formulé pour offrir des performances exceptionnelles dans les transmissions automatiques, notre fluide Dexron 3 assure un changement fluide, empêche la surchauffe et prolonge la durée de vie de la transmission.
fr.Performance You Can Rely On: Des Performances sur Lesquelles Vous Pouvez Compter
fr.Our automotive lubricants are engineered: Nos lubrifiants automobiles sont conçus pour la durabilité et l'efficacité — conçus pour réduire les frottements, améliorer les performances du moteur et prolonger la durée de vie du véhicule. Que ce soit pour les conducteurs quotidiens ou les moteurs haute performance, les formules avancées de BAKO offrent une fiabilité inégalée.
fr.Advanced protection against wear, suitab: Protection avancée contre l'usure, adaptée à tous les moteurs modernes.
fr.Perfect balance of performance and value: Équilibre parfait entre performance et valeur pour les véhicules de tourisme.
fr.Formulated to protect older engines, red: Formulé pour protéger les moteurs plus anciens, réduire les fuites et prolonger la durée de vie.
fr.Ready to Enhance Your Engine’s Performan: Prêt à Améliorer les Performances de Votre Moteur ?
fr.Contact us today to learn more about our: Contactez-nous dès aujourd'hui pour en savoir plus sur nos solutions de lubrifiants automobiles.
fr.Our industrial lubricants are formulated: Nos lubrifiants industriels sont formulés pour réduire les frottements, améliorer l'efficacité des machines et prolonger la durée de vie des équipements. De la fabrication lourde à la production d'énergie, les solutions de BAKO assurent un fonctionnement fluide dans les conditions industrielles les plus exigeantes.
fr.Designed for precision machinery, ensuri: Conçue pour les machines de précision, assurant des performances fluides du système hydraulique et une protection contre l'usure.
fr.High-performance lubricant that extends: Lubrifiant haute performance qui prolonge la durée de vie du compresseur tout en améliorant l'efficacité énergétique.
fr.Formulated for heavy-duty gear systems t: Formulé pour les systèmes d'engrenages lourds afin de minimiser les frottements et de prolonger la durée de vie des composants.
fr.Keep Your Industry Moving with Confidenc: Maintenez Votre Industrie en Mouvement avec Confiance
fr.Contact us to discover how BAKO’s indust: Contactez-nous pour découvrir comment les lubrifiants industriels de BAKO peuvent améliorer votre efficacité opérationnelle.
fr.At BAKO Group, our mission is to drive i: Chez BAKO Group, notre mission est de stimuler l'innovation et la durabilité dans la technologie de lubrification. Nous croyons que chaque goutte d'huile que nous produisons porte notre engagement envers la qualité, la fiabilité et le progrès mondial.
fr.Thank you for choosing BAKO as your trus: Merci de choisir BAKO comme votre partenaire de confiance en solutions de lubrification. Nous nous réjouissons d'un voyage réussi ensemble.
fr.Our team is dedicated to understanding y: Notre équipe est dédiée à comprendre vos besoins uniques et à fournir des solutions sur mesure qui stimulent la performance et l'efficacité. Nous nous engageons envers l'innovation, la durabilité et l'excellence dans tout ce que nous faisons.

zh.Bako Group가 화학 물질의 안전한 사용을 위한 유럽 규정을 준수하: 确认 Bako 集团遵守欧洲化学品安全使用法规。
zh.Occupational Health & Safety Management: 职业健康与安全管理体系 ISO 45001
zh.Awarded to Bako Group for our commitment: 授予 Bako 集团，以表彰其对环境保护和可持续发展的承诺。
zh.Recognizes Bako Group's dedication to ma: 认可 Bako 集团在保持最高质量管理标准方面的奉献精神。
zh.Acknowledges Bako Group's prioritization: 表彰 Bako 集团在运营中优先保障员工健康与安全。
zh.Confirms that Bako Group adheres to Euro: 确认 Bako 集团遵守欧洲化学品安全使用法规。
zh.facilities_description: BAKO集团拥有先进的制造和实验室设施，以确保我们提供的每一款产品都符合最高的质量、安全和创新标准。
zh.factory_description: 先进的生产设施，确保稳定的产品质量。
zh.production_description: 采用现代化设备和技术，确保可靠的产能。
zh.lab_description: 通过全面测试，确保每种润滑油的卓越品质。
zh.rd_description: 致力于开发满足未来润滑需求的新配方。
zh.At BAKO Group, our mission is to drive i: 在 BAKO 集团，我们的使命是推动润滑技术的创新和可持续发展。我们相信，我们生产的每一滴油都承载着我们对质量、可靠性和全球进步的承诺。
zh.“Our journey is not just about performan: “我们的旅程不仅仅关乎性能——更关乎合作、信任，共同建设更美好的未来。”
zh.Premium quality oils for all types of ve: 适用于所有类型车辆的优质油品，确保最佳性能和发动机保护。我们的汽车润滑剂设计符合最高标准，提供卓越的发动机保护、改善的燃油效率和延长车辆寿命。
zh.Specialized lubricants for industrial ma: 专为工业机械设计的润滑剂，减少摩擦并延长设备寿命。为重型工业应用设计，我们的润滑剂最小化磨损、减少停机时间，并在制造和建筑环境中增强运营效率。
zh.Bako, the lubricant brand of world-class: Bako 是世界级石化公司 GS Caltex 的润滑剂品牌，受到全球客户的信任。
zh.*Recognized as Korea's No. 1 brand in th: *连续九年荣获韩国第一品牌奖润滑剂类别第一品牌
zh.Bako is a trusted and certified company: Bako 是一家值得信赖的认证公司，专门从事高质量矿物油和润滑剂。我们致力于为汽车和工业应用提供可靠的优质产品。
zh.Our oils are manufactured to the highest: 我们的油品按照最高国际标准制造，确保您的机械和车辆的性能、保护和寿命。
zh.With years of experience and a reputatio: 凭借多年的经验和卓越的声誉，Bako 是润滑剂行业质量和信任的象征。我们的使命是为全球合作伙伴和客户提供创新解决方案和卓越的客户服务。
zh.premium_lubricants_text: 汽车和工业应用的高品质润滑剂和矿物油。
zh.We are proud to present the highest stan: 我们自豪地呈现最高质量和卓越标准。
zh.Awarded for our commitment to applying t: 因我们在所有运营中应用最高质量管理标准的承诺而获奖，确保客户满意并提供超出期望的产品和服务。
zh.Recognizing our team's efforts in provid: 认可我们团队在提供卓越客户服务体验和建立强大、可持续客户关系方面的努力。我们相信卓越服务是成功的基础。
zh.This certificate is awarded for our pion: 此证书因我们在开发推动行业进步的创新解决方案方面的先锋作用而颁发。我们始终努力采用最新技术为合作伙伴提供附加价值。
zh.High performance lubricant for modern au: 现代汽车发动机的高性能润滑剂。
zh.Synthetic lubricant for extended engine: 延长发动机寿命的合成润滑剂。
zh.Advanced protection for high-performance: 高性能发动机的先进保护。
zh.Heavy-duty oil for trucks and commercial: 卡车和商用车辆的重型油。
zh.Eco-friendly lubricant for modern engine: 现代发动机的环保润滑剂。
zh.Premium oil for industrial machinery and: 工业机械和设备的优质油。
zh.Your message will be sent directly to ou: 您的消息将直接发送到我们的收件箱。
zh.Best Automotive Kinetics Oil & Lubricant: 最佳汽车动力学油和润滑剂
zh.Our car oils are produced using advanced: 我们的汽车油使用先进的精炼工艺生产，将高质量基础油与最先进的添加剂混合，以确保最大程度的发动机保护、性能和寿命。
zh.Strict quality control at every stage: 每个阶段严格的质量控制
zh.Founded in 1995, Bako Oil Company began: Bako Oil Company成立于1995年，最初是一家小型家族企业，致力于为汽车行业提供高质量润滑剂。多年来，我们已成为矿物油和润滑剂的领先制造商，为全球客户服务。
zh.Our commitment to innovation, sustainabi: 我们对创新、可持续性和客户满意度的承诺促使我们扩大运营并投资最先进的设施。今天，Bako已成为润滑剂市场可靠性和卓越的象征。
zh.Meets and exceeds international standard: 符合并超过国际标准 (API, ACEA 等)
zh.High viscosity index for optimal perform: 所有温度下最佳性能的高粘度指数
zh.Excellent detergency and dispersancy for: 更清洁发动机的优秀洗涤性和分散性
zh.Superior oxidation and thermal stability: 卓越的氧化和热稳定性
zh.Low volatility for reduced oil consumpti: 低挥发性以减少油消耗
zh.Name: 姓名
